recipe.title: Green Machine Freezer-Prep Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ medium clove ; unsweetened almond milk ; 120 mL

steps.step: Add the spinach, almond butter, dates, chia seeds, banana, and avocado to a resealable container. Cover and store in the freezer for up to 3 months.
When ready to prepare, add the contents from the container and the almond milk to a blender and blend until smooth.
